column4: I see that Nero is a non-free program. How long does it last for a trail? Anyone know off-hand?
I know but I want to burn nero files :(
I will try the other program first.
Now I used to just install ubuntu-restricted for gnome but I am using XFCE is there another restricted package for the same thing?
the video drivers should be the same, no matter what WM you use. :)
